metadata.name: Snkr Bricks by Sneaker News
metadata.description: Snkr Bricks are NFTs earned by owning Snkr Frens by Sneaker News. Each Snkr Frens NFT generates 1 Snkr Brick NFT every 30 days. Burn Snkr Bricks for exclusive Sneaker News Insider Drops. Trade, sell or buy more Snkr Bricks and stack up. Mint a Snkr Fren: https://sncc.sneakernews.com/
